verbose_text: Positron emission tomography (PET) using tracers for assessment of glucose metabolism by [18 F] FDG or proliferation by [18 F] FLT or qualitative assessment of sst-receptor expression by [68 Ga] DOTATOC has already shown promising results in clinical studies for response assessment of cytotoxic chemotherapies and peptide receptor radiotherapy XREF_BIBR - XREF_BIBR.
